pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package implements the method of simulated moments for the GLMM logit mixed model as described in Jiang's (1998) article, Consistent Estimators in Generalized Linear Mixed Models. // The package contains 5 functions. Currently, it is able to implement a specific version of Jiang's (1998) paper using solvers provided by the packages nleqslv and rootSolve.
